text: Takao Sawai (born 21 September 1940) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Takao Sawai
